titles: A right fruitfull admonition, concerning the order of a good Christian mans life very profitable for all maner of estates, and other to beholde and looke vppon. Made by the famous Doctour Colete, sometime deane of Paules.
A ryght frutefull monycion, concernynge the ordre of a good chrysten mannes lyfe
author: Colet, John, 1467?-1519.
notes: Issued with STC 10889, an English translation of Fisher, John.  Tractatus de orando Deum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
